text: Michael Grant Ignatieff (; born May 12, 1947) is a Canadian author, academic and former politician. He was the leader of the Liberal Party and leader of the Opposition from 2008 until 2011. He resigned in May 2011 after his party lost in the 2011 federal election.Ignatieff resigns as Liberal leader . Brantford Expositor, May 3, 2011.
